languages.text: "Если бы вы спросили мое мнение, я бы непременно отметил, что тащить подобную дрянь на корабль — безответственная идея. Пусть себе лежит на Богом-Императором забытом мире".

traits.locale_text: "Если бы вы спросили мое мнение, я бы непременно отметил, что тащить подобную дрянь на корабль — безответственная идея. Пусть себе лежит на Богом-Императором забытом мире".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "If you ask my opinion, I would make sure to point out that bringing such rubbish onto a voidship is irresponsible. Leave it to rot on this Emperor-forsaken world."
languages.original_text: "Если бы вы спросили мое мнение, я бы непременно отметил, что тащить подобную дрянь на корабль — безответственная идея. Пусть себе лежит на Богом-Императором забытом мире".

traits.locale_text: "If you ask my opinion, I would make sure to point out that bringing such rubbish onto a voidship is irresponsible. Leave it to rot on this Emperor-forsaken world."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If you asked my opinion, I would be sure to point out that bringing such rubbish onto a voidship is irresponsible. Leave it to rot on this Emperor-forsaken world."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If you ask my opinion, I would make sure to point out that bringing such rubbish onto a voidship is irresponsible. Leave it to rot on this Emperor-forsaken world."

traits.locale_text: "If you ask my opinion, I would make sure to point out that bringing such rubbish onto a voidship is irresponsible. Leave it to rot on this Emperor-forsaken world."

traits.locale_text: "If you ask my opinion, I would make sure to point out that bringing such rubbish onto a voidship is irresponsible. Leave it to rot on this Emperor-forsaken world."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「個人的な意見ですが、そのようなガラクタをヴォイドシップに乗せるのは無責任の極みです。この皇帝に見捨てられた惑星でそのまま朽ちさせたほうがよろしいかと」
languages.original_text: "If you ask my opinion, I would make sure to point out that bringing such rubbish onto a voidship is irresponsible. Leave it to rot on this Emperor-forsaken world."

traits.locale_text: 「個人的な意見ですが、そのようなガラクタをヴォイドシップに乗せるのは無責任の極みです。この皇帝に見捨てられた惑星でそのまま朽ちさせたほうがよろしいかと」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Si me lo pregunta, quisiera mencionar que subir semejante basura a una nave del vacío es algo tremendamente irresponsable. Deje que se pudra en este mundo olvidado por el Emperador».
languages.original_text: "If you ask my opinion, I would make sure to point out that bringing such rubbish onto a voidship is irresponsible. Leave it to rot on this Emperor-forsaken world."

traits.locale_text: «Si me lo pregunta, quisiera mencionar que subir semejante basura a una nave del vacío es algo tremendamente irresponsable. Deje que se pudra en este mundo olvidado por el Emperador».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “恕我直言，大人，将这样一件垃圾带回虚空舰是不负责任的行为。就让它朽烂在这个神皇厌弃的罪孽之地吧。”
languages.original_text: "If you ask my opinion, I would make sure to point out that bringing such rubbish onto a voidship is irresponsible. Leave it to rot on this Emperor-forsaken world."

traits.locale_text: “恕我直言，大人，将这样一件垃圾带回虚空舰是不负责任的行为。就让它朽烂在这个神皇厌弃的罪孽之地吧。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Si on me demandait mon avis, je soulignerais qu'apporter un tel objet à bord du vaisseau serait totalement irresponsable. Laissez-le dans ce monde maudit. »
languages.original_text: "If you ask my opinion, I would make sure to point out that bringing such rubbish onto a voidship is irresponsible. Leave it to rot on this Emperor-forsaken world."

traits.locale_text: « Si on me demandait mon avis, je soulignerais qu'apporter un tel objet à bord du vaisseau serait totalement irresponsable. Laissez-le dans ce monde maudit. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Falls Euch meine Meinung interessiert, muss ich anmerken, dass es unverantwortlich ist, solchen Müll auf ein Raumschiff zu bringen. Lasst ihn auf dieser vom Imperator verlassenen Welt verrotten."
languages.original_text: "If you ask my opinion, I would make sure to point out that bringing such rubbish onto a voidship is irresponsible. Leave it to rot on this Emperor-forsaken world."

traits.locale_text: "Falls Euch meine Meinung interessiert, muss ich anmerken, dass es unverantwortlich ist, solchen Müll auf ein Raumschiff zu bringen. Lasst ihn auf dieser vom Imperator verlassenen Welt verrotten."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Bana kalırsa böylesine bir zırvayı uçsuz gemisine sokmak sorumsuzluk olur. Bırakalım da İmparator'un unuttuğu bu dünyada çürüsün gitsin."
languages.original_text: "If you ask my opinion, I would make sure to point out that bringing such rubbish onto a voidship is irresponsible. Leave it to rot on this Emperor-forsaken world."
